text:
@pritipatel Why are these 'protests' allowed during a 'pandemic'? 
I've stayed home for 4 mnths. I've gone in 2 debt to feed my family & dogs with online orders because I'm at risk & to not burden the NHS. What was it all for? If covid-19 is truly such a risk I'm screwed now with this spread
